macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Indexes Rally on Monday
items.summary: The Dow Jones rose 0.6% to 49,412, S&P 500 gained 0.5% to 6,950, and Nasdaq advanced 0.4% to 23,601, recovering last week's losses amid resilient risk appetite. Gold surged past $5,100 briefly, settling at $5,008, while the US dollar weakened.

items.title: Major US Indexes Post Gains Monday
items.summary: S&P 500 climbed 0.5% or 34.62 points to 6,950.23, Dow added 0.6% or 313.69 points to 49,412.40, Nasdaq rose 0.4% to 23,601.36, while Russell 2000 dipped 0.4%. Baker Hughes shares led after strong earnings.

items.title: University of Michigan Consumer Sentiment Hits Five-Month High
items.summary: Consumer sentiment index rose to 56.4 in January, beating Wall Street forecasts and marking the largest increase since June, supporting reflation narrative despite disinflation signals.

items.title: Trump Announces 25% Tariffs on South Korean Goods
items.summary: President Trump plans to increase tariffs on South Korean imports to 25%, potentially weighing on early Asian market sentiment amid ongoing geopolitical concerns.

items.title: FOMC Meeting Looms with Rate Cut Odds
items.summary: Federal Reserve's FOMC meets this week, with markets slightly favoring steady rates but open to a 25 basis point cut; prior PCE inflation held steady at 0.2% monthly.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Drops Below $88,000 USDT Amid Mixed Markets
items.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) fell below 88,000 USDT to trade at 87,999.070313 USDT, showing a 0.21% increase over 24 hours despite stalling at $88K due to tariffs, dollar weakness, and rising institutional activity.

items.title: NYSE Advances Tokenized Securities Platform; Chainlink Boosts TradFi Data Integration
items.summary: The New York Stock Exchange is developing a platform for tokenized securities, while Chainlink expands its data services for traditional finance. Additional reports analyze Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana ecosystems.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Shift Up CEO Cites Chinese Competition as Reason for Adopting AI in Game Development
items.summary: Shift Up's CEO, Hyung-tae Kim, stated that the studio needs AI to compete with Chinese developers deploying 1,000-2,000 staff per game compared to Shift Up's 150, amid debates on China's actual dominance in the industry.

items.title: Highguard Game Launches After Rocky Marketing, Early Impressions Positive
items.summary: Highguard has officially released following a controversial marketing reveal, with early play sessions indicating the game is quite good despite initial backlash.

items.title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake Ranks 9th in Top Paid Xbox Titles for January
items.summary: The Xbox port of Final Fantasy 7 Remake has achieved significant success, debuting as the 9th top-paid game on US Xbox stores in January.

items.title: Valve Faces £656 Million UK Lawsuit Over Steam Pricing and Commissions
items.summary: A UK tribunal ruled that a £656 million ($897.7 million) lawsuit against Valve can proceed, alleging excessive 30% commissions and anti-competitive practices on Steam since 2018 affecting up to 14 million users.

items.title: Konami Gaming Appoints Deron Hunsberger as VP of North American Sales
items.summary: Konami Gaming has hired industry veteran Deron Hunsberger as Vice President of North American Sales to strengthen its regional operations.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
